name: Settler Cleantech Oy
membership: Settler Cleantech Oy is not a member of any of the above-mentioned bodies.
memberOrga: Settler Cleantech Oy has no member organisations.
goal: To facilitate cleantech investments in the European single-market through innovative marketing and financing solutions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives: We are seeking EFSI or direct EIB funding for financing cleantech investments in the European single-market.
